title: Bamboo Basket #2
description: 03-10; conical structure with raised openwork rectangular shape on one side of top; small hole at top with removable lid that has black painted bamboo stick pierced by pointed top spire; two \"screens\" of openwork carving at either side of top of body and a few areas of low-relief carving of bamboo trees and leaves
creditline: Gift of Ruth and David Waterbury
artist: Binh Pho, American, born Vietnam, born 1955
